metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3847 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Bluetooth in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allows attackers to remove stored SMS messages via a crafted application, aka internal bug 22343270.

notes.Note: sbeattie> missing permission check for deleting SMS messages jdstrand> Ubuntu does not use android bluetooth stack

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
